# sakura_iam_service_principal (Data Source)

Get information about an existing IAM Service Principal.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "sakura_iam_service_principal" "foobar" {
  name = "foobar"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (String) The ID of the IAM Service Principal.
- `name` (String) The name of the IAM Service Principal.

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (String) The creation timestamp of the IAM Service Principal
- `description` (String) The description of the IAM Service Principal.
- `project_id` (String) The project ID associated with the IAM Service Principal
- `updated_at` (String) The last update timestamp of the IAM Service Principal
